nodes.text: Iron Cesta Flight was a squadron of the Naboo Royal Space Fighter Corps and was piloted exclusively by Gungans. The squadron patrolled the Naboo system for pirates preying upon the traffic between Naboo and the Ohma-D'un colony.
It was established by Gungans, including Toba, who volunteered for service with the Naboo Royal Space Fighter Corps in of the wake of Invasion of Naboo.

The members of this group flew G-1 starfighters, which were built as a joint venture between BullbaBong and Theed Palace Space Vessel Engineering Corps. G-1s superficially resembled the royal N-1 starfighters but were equipped for longer periods of independent operation and sustained combat in-system.
